whyifail:

One Sentence TL;DR: The Little House on the Prairie cast get buried alive for dinosaur alien cricket things to eat later.

This movie has a really weird structure and for the life of me Iâm just not sure in what direction the director wanted this movie to go in. Is it a…

This review looks awesome, but I am not reading past that terrifying first line. Brr.

(Just kidding. I read the rest, including the photo of “the hell spawns of a utahraptor, a giant cricket, a naked mole rat, and humpback anglerfish”. Which is awesome, I needed to stay up late and work on something tonight, and after seeing that, I might never sleep again.

(You will be surprised to know that the review – and, presumably, the movie – has a happy ending. A happy, terrifying ending.)

)
